name: NATIVE AMERICAN FINANCIAL SERVICES ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: Parity for Native American Nations in financial services
Parity for Native American Nations in financial services

NAFSA is a 501(c)6 trade association located in Washington, D.C that advocates for tribal sovereignty, promotes responsible financial services, and provides better economic opportunity in Indian Count
